    P

    parse(String) - Static method in class nameExtractor.ParsingUtils
    Parses all Java files in a given root directory and returns a list of pairs containing the absolute file path and the corresponding CompilationUnit.

    Utility class providing methods to parse Java source files, configure symbol solving, and discover package directories for a project.

    printPath - Static variable in class nameExtractor.MainClass

    processLoopStatement(Statement, String) - Static method in class nameExtractor.MainClass
    Helper method to process a single loop statement: extract line number, statements, increment counter, and apply labelling.
    processRepository(String, int) - Static method in class nameExtractor.MainClass
    Processes a single repository: parses files, extracts loops, categorizes and refactors.
    processTransformationFile(Path, Set<String>) - Static method in class nameExtractor.MainClass
    Processes a single transformation file by locating the corresponding source Java file, replacing the target for-loop/for-each statement with the new stream-based code, and compiling the modified file.

    V

    Visits a variable declaration and adds its name to the set.

    visit(NameExpr, HashSet<NameExpr>) - Method in class nameExtractor.Visitors.CollectNames
    Visits a variable reference and adds it to the set.
    visit(SimpleName, HashSet<SimpleName>) - Method in class nameExtractor.Visitors.CollectSimpleNames
    Visits a simple name and adds it to the set.
    visit(UnaryExpr, HashSet<String>) - Method in class nameExtractor.Visitors.CollectUnary

    visit(ForStmt, HashSet<ForStmt>) - Method in class nameExtractor.Visitors.CollectForStmt
    Visits a traditional for-loop and adds it to the set.
    Visitors - Class in nameExtractor
    Utility class containing various JavaParser visitors to collect specific AST elements.
    Visitors() - Constructor for class nameExtractor.Visitors
     
    Visitors.CollectAssignments - Class in nameExtractor
    Visitor to collect variable assignments.
    Visitors.CollectForEachStmt - Class in nameExtractor
    Visitor to collect all enhanced for-each loops (ForEachStmt) in a compilation unit or block.
    Visitors.CollectForStmt - Class in nameExtractor
    Visitor to collect all traditional for-loops (ForStmt) in a compilation unit or block.
    Visitors.CollectNames - Class in nameExtractor
    Visitor to collect all variable references (NameExpr) in a block or statement.
    Visitors.CollectSimpleNames - Class in nameExtractor
    Visitor to collect all simple identifiers (SimpleName) in the AST.
    Visitors.CollectUnary - Class in nameExtractor
    Visitor to collect variables involved in unary expressions.
    Visitors.CollectVariable - Class in nameExtractor
    Visitor to collect variable names from variable declarations.
